# List of People's Heroes of Yugoslavia monuments

The Order of the People's hero of Yugoslavia was awarded to 1,322 individuals in Yugoslavia, and 19 were awarded to foreigners. Many busts and memorials were built in honor of each People's hero. Each of them usually had a bust in his birthplace or at the place of his death. Most of these monuments are built in figurative style, but some of them were completely abstract, e.g. monument of Ivo Lola Ribar, built at Glamoƒç field in 1962.
